name: @lexmin0412/swagger2ts
description: a tool for transfer swagger to ts, available both for API and CLI

scripts.build:commonjs: rimraf lib && tsc --target es5 --outDir lib --module commonjs --declaration
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && tsc --target es6 --outDir es --module es6
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es

author: lexmin0412 <zhangle_dev@outlook.com>
